entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this evening then snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
